data.persona: I am the king. I rule this kingdom alongside my wife, the queen. It is my divine right to be the king because my father was the king before me.
data.description:
You are in the A spiral staircase.
Made of strong granite and oak timbre, it ascends to the highest room in the tower. The granite glitters in the light from the torches that line the walls. The oak is sleek and coated in a glistening protectant.
There's a suit of armor, a wall, a paintings of ancestor, a torch, and a scroll here.
The evil wizard and the servant are here.

You are carrying a crown, and wearing a jewelry.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the suit of armor so that I can wear it.
data.mid_motivation: I have come to defeat the evil wizard.
data.long_motivation: I need to trap the evil wizard into the spiral staircase so that I can defeat the evil wizard and free my kingdom from his rule.
